name: MovieBuff
0:
”Alexa, ask movie buff to tell me about TITANIC movie”
”Alexa, open movie buff”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie buff
des:
To know about the ratings, plot, production, release date etc for the world cinema + local cinema.

Say:: Alexa, open movie buff and tell me about <MOVIE NAME>
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
